casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Chris Darryl DRYE. No. 2P09. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 8, 2009. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of January 2009 by Defendant to Proceed in Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of January 2009."
